Hong Kong has recently developed into a serious flashpoint in East Asia, I think we should aim to reduce the spread of misinformation regarding Hong Kong. Hong Kong is a sovereign territory of China (People's Republic) but it has high autonomy under international law, guaranteed until 2047.9322653292019122416082019-12-2416:08Kiteinthewind0Reverted good faith edits by Jargo Nautilus: If people read nothing but the short description of a long article on Wikipedia, then it is their problem. Why are we pandering to Chinese Nationalism here so much, that we have to stress where the sovereignty lies in Hong Kong? (TW)9321958132019122403092019-12-2403:09Jargo Nautilus0Undid revision 932136942 by Kiteinthewind (talk) If Hong Kong and Shanghai are both described as "Asian cities" then people will think they are administratively the same, when, in fact, they are totally different.9321369422019122318282019-12-2318:28Kiteinthewind0Edited description to “Asian city”.
